dialogue: Hello, and welcome to Hex Game! (Patent Pending). This is a tutorial to teach you how to play the game; if, at any time, you want to just get started, hit the button in the top right corner to go straight to gameplay.
Hi Papa! This is Sebby leaving a message.
Also help I've been trapped inside the hex game; please send me the Lego Hogwarts set (https://www.lego.com/en-us/product/hogwarts-castle-71043) so I can escape. Thanks!
